Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE ST_DISTANCE(root["Point"], {"Position": {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 20.1, "Latitude": 20}, "BoundingBox": null, "AdditionalProperties": {}}) FROM root

SELECT VALUE ST_WITHIN(root["Point"], {"Rings": [{"Positions": [{"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 10, "Latitude": 10}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 30, "Latitude": 10}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 30, "Latitude": 30}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 10, "Latitude": 30}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 10, "Latitude": 10}], "BoundingBox": null, "AdditionalProperties": {}}], "BoundingBox": null, "AdditionalProperties": {}}) FROM root

SELECT VALUE root FROM root WHERE ST_INTERSECTS(root["Point"], {"Rings": [{"Positions": [{"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 10, "Latitude": 10}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 30, "Latitude": 10}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 30, "Latitude": 30}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 10, "Latitude": 30}, {"Altitude": null, "Longitude": 10, "Latitude": 10}], "BoundingBox": null, "AdditionalProperties": {}}], "BoundingBox": null, "AdditionalProperties": {}})
